SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk

Class HddCloudlet

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Cloudlet
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk.HddCloudlet
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebCloudlet
public class HddCloudlet extends Cloudlet
A cloudlet that requires disk operations in addition to CPU ones. Besides disk operations this cloudlet also defines RAM, which is constantly requred while it is running.
Author:
nikolay.grozev
